::: {#hero-heading}
**Wei LIU** is a PhD student in Economics at the University of Nottingham Ningbo (UNNC), China. Her research interests include *International Trade, Automation, and Industrial Economics*. She obtained both her bachelor’s and master’s degrees from Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics (JUFE). 

## Her City Stories
She is from [Jiujiang](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jiujiang), Jiangxi Province, a city known for its beautiful views. The city is home to a 5A scenic site, [Mount Lu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Lu). She spent 18 years in Jiujiang, 6 years in [Nanchang](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanchang), also in Jiangxi Province, and 5 years in [Shenzhen](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shenzhen), Guangdong Province. Shenzhen is the city she loves the most, as it enjoys blue skies on most days of the year and is located by the sea. Now her journey continues in [Ningbo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ningbo), Zhejiang Province.

:::
